Subject: Help organizing a created report
Description: Hello. I have had help from the team to create a report that will provide us with permission groups for our servers. I am looking to try and better organize this report and understand the columns I can add. Thank you
What_We_Know__c:
report already in place

goes through the FS and report security groups and the paths

uses SA_FSAA_PrermissionsView

includes groups and users

wants to filter out users

 

modified filters and filtered for only domain users using TrusteeTypeDescription column

 

the report shows the folder path, but he would prefer the share path

 

may need to engage with ProServ for this
-he doesn't really want to do that, so he's going to play around with SQL View Creation and try to join tables
Next_Steps__c: He's going to let me know how the report works for him now
Solution_Comment__c:
Client wanted assistance filtering an existing custom report
modified filters and filtered for only domain users using TrusteeTypeDescription column
